item.title: A.Maya add a quote by Isaac Newton
item.description: "If I have seen further it is by standing on the shoulders of Giants." -- Isaac Newton

item.title: A.Maya add a quote by Pramoedya Ananta Toer
item.description: "How simple life is. It's as simple as this: you're hungry and you eat, you're full and you shit. Between eating and shitting, that's where human life is found. - (Houseboy + Maid, in Tales from Djakarta)" -- Pramoedya Ananta Toer

item.title: A.Maya add a quote by Dee
item.description: "Kita memang tak pernah tahu apa yang dirindukan sampai sesuatu itu tiba di depan mata." -- Dee

item.title: A.Maya add a quote by Seno Gumira Ajidarma
item.description: "Aku tidak pernah keberatan menunggu siapa pun berapa lama pun selama aku mencintainya" (dalam cerpen Linguae, Linguae, Gramedia, 2007)" -- Seno Gumira Ajidarma

item.title: A.Maya add a quote by Jostein Gaarder
item.description: "A Russian astronaut and a Russian brain surgeon were once discussing religion. The brain surgeon was a Christian but the astronaut was not. The astronaut said, 'I've been out in space many times but I've never seen God or angels.' And the brain surgeon said, 'And I've operated on many clever brains but I've never seen a single thought." -- Jostein Gaarder

item.title: A.Maya add a quote by E.E. Cummings
item.description: "may came home with a smooth round stone as small as a world and as large as alone." -- E.E. Cummings

item.title: A.Maya add a quote by Dave Eggers
item.description: "Here I am Rock You Like a Hurricane." -- Dave Eggers

item.title: A.Maya add a quote by Roberto Bolaño
item.description: "Every hundred feet the world changes" -- Roberto Bolaño

item.title: A.Maya add a quote by Hans Christian Andersen
item.description: "To move, to breathe, to fly, to float, To gain all while you give, To roam the roads of lands remote, To travel is to live." -- Hans Christian Andersen

item.title: A.Maya add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "You are, and always have been, my dream." -- Nicholas Sparks
